meta.purpose: UI/UX mockup for a TV library/collection page showing all tracked shows and movies in a poster grid
meta.notes_for_model: This is the household's collection of tracked shows and movies - a personal catalog of everything the family watches. It should feel like browsing a curated collection at a boutique video store or a beautifully organized entertainment shelf.

story.one_sentence_brief: A visually stunning library page displaying a grid of movie and TV show posters with gradient overlays, progress indicators, and streaming provider badges, complete with filter controls and search functionality.
story.additional_context: This is the 'shelf' of the family's home entertainment. Users browse their collection here, filter by TV vs Movies, and manage their tracked titles. The poster-forward design celebrates the artwork while providing useful metadata.

scene.subject: A responsive grid of TV show and movie poster cards (2:3 aspect ratio) arranged in 5-6 columns. Each card shows a poster image with a subtle gradient overlay at the bottom, the title overlaid, and small badges for media type (TV/Movie) and streaming provider logos. A header section shows 'Library' title with filter buttons (All | TV Shows | Movies) and an 'Add Title' button.
secondary_subjects: Segmented filter buttons styled as pills with gold active state
Progress bars on TV show cards showing viewing progress
Streaming provider logo badges in top corners of cards
Search/Add FAB on mobile or header button on desktop
scene.action: Static UI mockup showing the library page with approximately 15-20 poster cards visible in the grid
scene.location: Digital web browser frame showing the library page at desktop resolution
scene.time_of_day: Neutral - this is a collection view without specific time context
scene.mood: Curated and organized satisfaction, like admiring a well-organized movie collection - pride in one's entertainment library

composition.shot_type: Full page screenshot/mockup view showing the library grid with header
composition.framing: Header with title and filters at top, poster grid fills the main content area. Cards are uniformly sized with consistent gaps. One card could show a subtle hover state.

style.medium: High-fidelity digital UI design mockup with poster artwork integration
style.era_or_reference: Plex or Letterboxd library view meets boutique video store aesthetic - curated collection with visual emphasis on the art
style.color_palette: Deep night background (#0D0F14), elevated surface cards (#1C2230) with poster images covering, cinema gold (#D4A853) for active filter states, warm white text overlay on posters, subtle gradient overlays from transparent to deep night

lighting.description: Poster images provide the main visual interest with their own lighting. Cards have subtle shadows suggesting depth. Hovered cards appear to lift with enhanced shadow. Background is uniformly dark.
lighting.color_and_contrast: Posters are slightly desaturated (95%) to create cohesion. Text overlays have gradient protection for legibility. Gold active states pop against the dark backgrounds.

format.surface_or_output: Desktop web browser mockup at 1920x1080 or higher, suitable for design presentation

constraints.factual_accuracy: Grid should be properly aligned with consistent spacing. Poster aspect ratios should be 2:3. Cards should look clickable/interactive.
constraints.safety_and_rights: Use generic/conceptual poster imagery, not real movie or TV show posters. Streaming provider logos should be generic or simplified shapes.
negative_elements: no illegible text over bright poster areas
